::Savanna::

She looked at HotRod.
"I don't think so.  Pred's aren't as dumb as they look."
She remembered that Blurr was all alone on the ship.
"Oh My! He's  alone in there. Blurr is in there alone."
She opened her commlink. "HEY BLURR! Keep and eye out. We got company 
coming and it's going to be a real Bang up job."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod walks to Savvana'a position.
> "We have some time, they are aways away. I dont think it's the same
> Preds, there coming from the direction of the Newcomer base."
> Hot Rod activates his comlink, on Maximal fequincy's.
> "All Maximals, the Newcomers are heading for the Cybertronian Fire. 
I f
> possible, get here. We need enforcements."
> He turns back to Savvana.
> "Lets hope their as easy, as those other Preds were."
